next_steps.step: Schedule a high-value engagement opportunity with key stakeholders to address the customer engagement concerns and re-establish rapport, focusing on their specific needs and pain points.
Proactively address any potential end-of-month delays by ensuring timely proposal submission, clear communication regarding timelines, and offering incentives for expedited decisions.
Review existing customer contracts to identify potential expansion opportunities or synergies with Product A, highlighting how this opportunity complements their current Schneider Electric solutions.
